document_data.name: ''Censer for Summoning Hostile Air Elementals''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''censer for summoning hostile air elementals''''' was a cursed [[magic item]] that summoned an onslaught of angry [[air elemental]]s.
document_data.Powers: This item summoned four enraged air elementals that attacked anything in sight. The elementals arrived one at a time over the course of several minutes. Once lit, this item could not be extinguished until either the user or air elementals were dead.<ref name="DMG2.R-p219 />
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Quelzur Naismen]], a [[Red Wizard]] of [[Thay]], had a ''censer for summoning air elementals'' that he used to power his pirate ship. Thankfully, his censer summoned air elementals that could be controlled.
